alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 10 at 1:13AM EDT until September 11 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Florida, including the following county, Okaloosa. * WHEN...Until 315 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1212 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a band of showers and thunderstorms producing torrential downpours over the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Valparaiso, Lake Lorraine, Ocean City, Shalimar, Cinco Bayou, Eglin Village, Longwood, Postil and Seminole.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
